modifier.mod_lavacow.broodmother.desc: §oEnjoy a Wormy Cuddle§r\nSpawn a Vespa larva during combat or when a block is harvested.

modifier.mod_lavacow.famine.desc: §oHorseman of Famine§r\nGives Hunger. Restore 1 hunger points when hitting a non-undead entity or harvesting a block.

modifier.mod_lavacow.unholytouch.desc: §oDamn to the livings!§r\nDeals bonus damage to non-undead entity and applies Weakness

tootip.mod_lavacow.bonesword: Deals additional %d%% of target's maximum HP as damage (Max %d).
tootip.mod_lavacow.canebeef: Gives Regeneration(0:08) when eaten, is also Salamander's favorite.
tootip.mod_lavacow.canepork: Gives Regeneration(0:08) when eaten, is also Weta's favorite.
tootip.mod_lavacow.canerottenmeat: Gives Regeneration(0:08) when eaten, is also Mimicrab's favorite.
tootip.mod_lavacow.goldenheart: Gives Regeneration and repairs(+1/sec) all equipments when equipped.
tootip.mod_lavacow.moltenaxe: Get charcoal when chopping down logs.
tootip.mod_lavacow.moltenhammer: Right click to deal damage to creatures around player.
tootip.mod_lavacow.potion_of_mooten_lava: Try feeding this to a cow with Fire Resistance. :)
tootip.mod_lavacow.reapers_scythe: All attacks sweep target, and their damage bypasses any armors.
tootip.mod_lavacow.famine: Gives Hunger. Restore 1 hunger points when hitting a non-undead entity.
tootip.mod_lavacow.frozenthigh: Is edible. Attacks give target SlownessIII(0:04)
tootip.mod_lavacow.sludge_wand: Right click to summon a loyal Lil'Sludge
tootip.mod_lavacow.war: Raise a war between you and your friend who built a wood cabin (need Fire Charge as ammunition)
tootip.mod_lavacow.intestine: Right click to find what's inside it
tootip.mod_lavacow.swinearmor.l2: Set(4): Remove negative potion effects after consuming food.
tootip.mod_lavacow.piranhalauncher: Right click to launch a Swarmer at target. (need Swarmer as ammunition)
tootip.mod_lavacow.cursed_bandage.1.desc: Heals 2 HP to your pet, as well as inflicting Strength(3:00)
tootip.mod_lavacow.cursed_bandage.3.desc: Heals 2 HP to your pet, as well as inflicting Resistance(3:00)
tootip.mod_lavacow.holy_grenade: Throw at target location and cause explosion. Undead within 300%% damage and get burned(0:08)
tootip.mod_lavacow.dreamcatcher: Catches the nightmarish creature from the dream.
tootip.mod_lavacow.undertaker_shovel: Right click to summon an army of Unburied.
tootip.mod_lavacow.raven_whistle: Right click to bind with a raven and order it to move to target location.
tootip.mod_lavacow.faminearmor: Set(2): +2 damage when in Hunger state.
tootip.mod_lavacow.faminearmor.l2: Set(4): No longer be able to eat, but +4 Hunger +1 Health when killing an entity.
tootip.mod_lavacow.ghostjelly: Transform your Raven into Ghost Raven.
tootip.mod_lavacow.ghostbomb: Throw at target location and cause explosion. Entities within also receive Levitate(0:01)
tootip.mod_lavacow.sonicbomb: Throw at target location and cause explosion. Entities within also receive WeaknessIII(0:04)
tootip.mod_lavacow.weta_hoe: When harvesting, also destroy nearby crops or grasses in 3x3 area.
tootip.mod_lavacow.mootenheart: Fire damage to player-%d%%. Can be used to brew
tootip.mod_lavacow.vespa_shield: Blocking damage, as well as dealing 2 damage to the attacker and inflicts it with Poison(0:06).
tootip.mod_lavacow.spectral_dagger: Has infinite durability, +2 damage vs non-undead
tootip.mod_lavacow.kings_crown.0.desc0: With a gem most people desired
tootip.mod_lavacow.kings_crown.0.desc1: Filled with memories from the past
tootip.mod_lavacow.kings_crown.0.desc2: The king shall ruled his kingdom, once again
tootip.mod_lavacow.kings_crown.1.desc0: A king does not need his body
tootip.mod_lavacow.kings_crown.1.desc1: As long as the soul is imbued in his crown
tootip.mod_lavacow.kings_crown.1.desc2: Even a dead corpse can fulfill his ambition
tootip.mod_lavacow.skeletonking_crown: Force nearby skeleton to become your loyal servant.
tootip.mod_lavacow.beast_claw.desc1: Set(2): Also gives Strength(0:03) & Haste(0:03) after pouncing
enchantment.mod_lavacow.lifesteal.desc: Heals the player while dealing damage to targets
enchantment.mod_lavacow.corrosive.desc: Weakens the target, causing it to receive more damage from any source
description.mob_effect.mod_lavacow:infes: Apply hunger and slowness, also spawn parasites when dead.
description.mob_effect.mod_lavacow:fragi: Cause instant death when health is low.
advancements.mod_lavacow.root.title: The Dark Night
Get a Potion of MOOten Lava
advancements.mod_lavacow.kill_weta.title: Insect Pit Survivor
advancements.mod_lavacow.get_hatred_shar: Get Memory of a Thousand Armies
